name: Rockia: They Watch Us Scream - Chikai (Episode One)
name_original: Rockia: They Watch Us Scream - Chikai (Episode One)
description:
(Only the Prologue is avaliable to download and read through, hope you enjoy! Leave support in the comments <3)

Xaphonx Opido and her friends live a generic life in the enclosed town of Shijin, Rockia. They spend their days having fun after school and living life to the fullest. In May 2025, the group welcomes two transfer students Aldryx and Agoti into their tiny group. 

But, despite this seemingly normal routine, someone dark is lurking beneath the surface, something that... someone in the group knows about. Yet, as more and more mysterious incidents occur, strange people show up, ones that know about this mystery, ones that know what is going to occur, and Xaphonx wonders just what else the town might be keeping from her, and better yet, if she can trust those who are closest to her, because in the world of Shijin, keeping secrets is what it's known for.

But, yet, while this all happes, her closest friends and family continuously show up murdered, and leaving clues about their tragic pasts, which piece together the ultimate mystery... with no outline of which way it all happened.
